metadata.title: CVE-2017-17866 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
pdf/pdf-write.c in Artifex MuPDF before 1.12.0 mishandles certain lengthchanges when a repair operation occurs during a clean operation, whichallows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer overflow andapplication crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a craftedPDF document.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17866` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.12.0+ds1-1
mupdf-tools - 1.12.0+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12.0+ds1-1').
